metronome.project.decrement(metronome: Metronome, n: int) → None¶

Decrement the bpm by n, ensure that the bpm cannot be decremented to less than 20.

Parameters:

  • metronome (Metronome) – the metronome object.

  • n (int) – the number by which the bpm should be decremented.

metronome.project.increment(metronome: Metronome, n: int) → None¶

Increment the bpm by n, ensure that the bpm cannot be incremented beyond 320.

Parameters:

  • metronome (Metronome) – the metronome object.

  • n (int) – the number by which the bpm will be incremented.

metronome.project.main()¶

Start the metronome.

Parse arguments from sys.argv, create a metronome object. Start the main thread (metronome), as well as a separate thread that runs the change_bpm-method. Run the validate_input method.
